mapper.select: SELECT rt.id, rt.name, d.name AS departmentName, m.name AS memberName, DATE_FORMAT(rt.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt FROM recruitment_template rt JOIN member m ON rt.member_id = m.id JOIN department d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE rt.is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY rt.created_at DESC

SELECT rt.id, rt.name, d.name AS departmentName, m.name AS memberName, DATE_FORMAT(rt.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt FROM recruitment_template rt JOIN member m ON rt.member_id = m.id JOIN department d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE rt.id = #{id} AND rt.is_deleted = 'N'

SELECT id, item_title AS itemTitle, default_content AS defaultContent, display_order AS displayOrder FROM recruitment_template_item WHERE recruitment_template_id = #{templateId} ORDER BY display_order
